name: Fill The Glass (itch)
description:
FILL THE GLASS

My entry for the 20 Second Game Jam! You have 20 seconds to fill all the glasses with water from the jug at the top of the screen.

This is my first game made with DragonRuby. As such, I wanted to keep the scope manageable with a WarioWare-style microgame. I'm pretty happy with how it turned out. Enjoy!

Controls ActionButtonPick up glassLeft-clickRestartRight-click

P.S., If you run into performance issues, try one of the desktop builds. They should be much faster than the browser.
